alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bradford, northwestern Alachua, southwestern Union and south central Columbia Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Upland Pines, or near Worthington Spring, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Worthington Spring, Alachua, High Springs, Worthington Springs, Upland Pines, Groves, Providence, La Crosse, Brooker and Dukes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua
